asset.author: Derek Fiechter
asset.hookText:
Buy my music here :

iTunes : https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/kingdom-of-magic/id587844395
Bandcamp : http://derekfiechter.bandcamp.com
Amazon mp3 : http://www.amazon.com/Kingdom-of-Magic/dp/B00AON1IPY

***

Tropical island music which will transport you to a place of solitude, peace, and delight. Watch the palm trees sway in the breeze. Feel the warm rays of the sun. Hear the cry of seagulls. Above all relax. Enjoy your time in the tropical island and listen to the music. Just picture yourself in Hawaii, the Caribbean, or some other tropical place, and you are sure to have a great time. Island Paradise is the name of this tropical music I composed. I hope you like it. Thanks!

***

These tropical island pictures were taken from Desktop Nexus.

Related Tags: Tropical Music, Island Music, Caribbean Music, Hawaiian Music, Beach Music, Ocean Music, Water Music, World Music, Happy Music, Summer Music, Relaxing Music, Instrumental Music, Film Music, Soundtrack Music, Game Music
